thread.title: Chiefs RB Charles done for season with knee injury
thread.title_full: Chiefs RB Charles done for season with knee injury

title: Chiefs RB Charles done for season with knee injury
text:
> Sports Chiefs RB Charles done for season with knee injury Kansas City Chiefs running back Jamaal Charles (25) lies injured on the field during the second half of an NFL football game against the Chicago Bears in Kansas City, Mo., Sunday, Oct. 11, 2015. (AP Photo/Charlie Riedel)
